name: Quarantine Bargain
description:
Move with arrow keys

Restart with R

Times are tough (and boring) during quarantine, so it's important to pack up  the supplies you need.

The problem is getting them, you see, the store has implemented a system so that only the strong shall get supplies, so they have set up obstacles to overcome.

Are you good enough to get your supplies?

Music  from the sims

A collaborative project of me and my friend
